name: Billiards Snooker Pro 3D
description:
Billiards Snooker Pro 3D is a suite of games featuring several variations of Pool, Billiards, Snooker, Crokinole and Carrom board games.
Welcome to the Billiards game! This is the must have Pool game and it is totally FREE.

Game Features:
- Very Realistic Pool, Billiard and Snooker Physics
- 3D graphics ball animation
- Touch control for moving the stick
- Snooker challenge
- Practice
